pages.about: About Us - BicycleTours BicycleTours Home About Us Testimonials Contact about BicycleTours Meet the minds behind the creativity, the philosophy shaping our approach, and the values guiding our interactions. Premium Brand our story Our story is more than a timeline; it’s a testament to resilience, creativity, and an unwavering commitment to customer success. Innovate. Elevate. Succeed. 25+ Years of Experience 150+ Tours Completed 37 Team Members Explore our history, where every milestone is a testament to our evolution as pioneers in bicycle tours. Explore the chapters that define us, showcasing our dedication to pushing boundaries and staying at the forefront of industry trends. Consistent Quality World-Class Cycling Tours our team Isabelle Morgan Product Manager Bryan Benjamin Head of Development Mark Taylor Head of Tour Design Contact Us Nossos Clientes Falam Testimonials from Our Satisfied Clients Welcome to the heart of our tour company - the stories of our valued clients. These testimonials are more than just words on a page; they are a testament to the exceptional experiences our clients have had with us. We invite you to explore their stories and see for yourself why they trust us. Every client we serve brings a unique perspective and set of expectations. We take great pride not only in meeting but exceeding those expectations, ensuring that every interaction with us is memorable and satisfying. As you read these testimonials, you will see that our commitment to excellence shines through every word. From the moment our clients engage with us to the completion of their bicycle tours and route planning, we strive to provide a seamless and enjoyable experience. These testimonials speak volumes about the quality of our services and the dedication of our team. We are immensely grateful to our clients for sharing their experiences and allowing us to be part of their journey. Behind every testimonial is a story of collaboration, trust, and success. We believe in building strong, lasting relationships with our clients, so their feedback is invaluable to us. Each testimonial serves as a beacon of inspiration, driving us to continually improve and innovate. We are committed to delivering nothing less than excellence in everything we do, and these testimonials reaffirm that commitment. Let's Work Together Elevate your brand. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - BicycleTours BicycleTours Home About Us Testimonials Contact Privacy Policy Last updated: July 17, 2024 Welcome to BicycleTours. We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data. Information We Collect We collect information that you provide to us directly, such as your name, email address, phone number, and payment information. How We Use Your Information Your information is used to provide and improve our services, process transactions, communicate with you, and for marketing purposes. Sharing Your Information We do not share your personal information with third parties except as necessary to provide our services or as required by law. Data Security We implement security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access and ensure data integrity. Cookies and Tracking Technologies We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience on our website and analyze site usage. Your Rights You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can also object to or restrict our processing of your data. Children's Privacy Our services are not intended for children under the age of 13, and we do not knowingly collect information from children. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on our website. Contact Us If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at: Phone: +91-856-8349576 Email: bicycle-tours@gmail.com Address: G5M3+7HQ, Pocket 10, Sector B, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi, Delhi 110070 International Data Transfers Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place for such transfers. Third-Party Links Our website may contain links to third-party sites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these sites. Consent By using our website, you consent to the collection and use of your information as described in this privacy policy. Data Retention We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this privacy policy. Governing Law This privacy policy is governed by the laws of India, and any disputes will be resolved in accordance with Indian law. Your Feedback We welcome your feedback on our privacy practices. Please contact us if you have any suggestions or concerns. BicycleTours Menu Home About Us Testimonials Contact Useful Links Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions © 2024 BicycleTours
pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions - BicycleTours BicycleTours Home About Us Testimonials Contact Terms and Conditions Last updated: July 17, 2024 Welcome to BicycleTours. By accessing and using our website and services, you agree to comply with the following terms and conditions. Acceptance of Terms By using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. If you do not agree, please do not use our services. Eligibility Our services are available only to individuals who are at least 18 years old. By using our services, you represent that you meet this age requirement. Account Registration To use certain features of our services, you may need to create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information. Booking and Payments All bookings are subject to availability. Payments must be made in full at the time of booking. We accept various payment methods as indicated on our website. Cancellation and Refunds Cancellations and refund policies are detailed on our website. Please review these policies before making a booking. User Conduct You agree not to use our services for any unlawful or prohibited activities. You must respect the rights and privacy of other users. Intellectual Property All content on our website, including text, graphics, and logos, is the property of BicycleTours and is protected by copyright laws. Limitation of Liability BicycleTours is not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of our services. Indemnification You agree to indemnify and hold BicycleTours harmless from any claims, damages, or expenses arising from your use of our services. Governing Law These terms and conditions are governed by the laws of India, and any disputes will be resolved in accordance with Indian law. Changes to Terms We may update these terms and conditions from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new terms on our website. Termination We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your access to our services at any time, without notice, for any reason. Severability If any provision of these terms is found to be unenforceable, the remaining provisions will remain in effect. Entire Agreement These terms and conditions constitute the entire agreement between you and BicycleTours regarding your use of our services. Contact Information If you have any questions about these terms and conditions, please contact us at: Phone: +91-856-8349576 Email: bicycle-tours@gmail.com Address: G5M3+7HQ, Pocket 10, Sector B, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi, Delhi 110070 BicycleTours Menu Home About Us Testimonials Contact Useful Links Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions © 2024 BicycleTours
